mapper.insert: insert into BOARD (category, title, writer, content, photo) values (#{category} , #{title} , #{writer} , #{content}, #{photo})
mapper.update: update BOARD set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, writer=#{writer}, category=#{category}, photo=#{photo} where seq=#{seq}
mapper.select: select * from BOARD WHERE date(regDate) between date(subdate(now(), INTERVAL 365 DAY)) and date(now())
SELECT count(*) FROM BOARD WHERE date(regDate) between date(subdate(now(), INTERVAL 365 DAY)) and date(now())

choose.when: AND (writer LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR category LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file(b_no, filename, fileoriginname, fileurl) VALUES(#{b_no}, #{filename}, #{fileoriginname}, #{fileurl})
